title: Vision Care Market in the US 2015-2019
text:
RSS Navigation Links HOME >> MEDICINE >> TECHNOLOGY Vision Care Market in the US 2015-2019 ... NEW YORK Sept. 3 2015 /...The types of vision care products considered for this report are Rx le... Date:9/3/2015 
NEW YORK , Sept. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About Vision Care Products 
The types of vision care products considered for this report are Rx lenses, frames, contact lenses, non-Rx sunglasses, and readers. These products are primarily used by consumer for vision correction and vision protection purposes. Products such as Rx lenses and contact lenses require a prescription for purchase while frames, non-Rx sunglasses, and readers are cosmetic products that can be purchased like any other apparel or accessories. The demand for prescription-based vision care products has gradually increased in the US. The lifestyle changes have induced people to use more technological devices on a daily basis. Technavio's analysts forecast the vision care market in the US to grow at a CAGR of 5.04% over the period 2014-2019.Covered in this ReportThis report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the vision care market in the US for the period 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, the report considers revenue generated from the sales of the following products:- Rx lenses- Non-Rx sunglasses - Readers Technavio's report, Vision Care Market in the US 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the US; it also covers the market landscape and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market. Key Region- Increase in Number of People Suffering from Eye Disorders- For a full, detailed list, view our reportMarket Challenge
